content.detailedDescription: I was traveling westbound on i90 at approximately 9pm or so and i noticed fireworks off to my left from the hoffman estates festival and slightly off to the right of the fireworks  i saw an orange light coming from that direction moving east/northeast.  i see planes all the time including large airliners as well as small planes and at a distance i thought this is what it was.  i quickly ruled out a large airliner as it got closer since it appeared to be at about 700 feet so i then thought it could be a small plane until it got even closer and i could see there were no red or blue lights or anything indicative of any plane or helicopter.  i could only watch it to the point out my windshield where it went almost directly over my car but it was sufficient to get a clear view of it.  my first reaction after ruling out any known aircraft was to think it was some sort of ember from the fireworks display but logically i knew this couldn't be the case as it seemed too large to be anything like that and it travelled fast and steady both horizontally  and vertical y relative to any fireworks i could see from the direction it came.  it was clear that the rest of the fireworks were doing their own thing and this thing was clearly staying at the same altitude and speed for the time i saw it moving away from the fireworks area.  as it came over my car, i struggled to see its shape and i almost call it round but it appeared to have some edges which i might describe as diamond shaped.  it had a glow to it, dark orange in the center fading to a lighter orange closer to the outside and then ever so thin maybe a grayish edge although it was hard to tell due to the glow from inside.  it was not flickering, bouncing or doing anything weird, it was simply a consistent intensity of a dull dark orange center to a lighter orange around the center travelling at a consistent speed and altitude.  i have always had an open-mind to such things and this is the very first time in my 40 years of life i have seen something so inexplicably different.  my question is, what was it doing there and where was it going and for what reason?  it obviously didn't care that people were seeing it or it wanted to be seen but why?
content.summary: Dark orange to light orange object.

content.detailedDescription: At 6 pm while leaving to go to oxford, ohio walmart, i too, noticed the orbs going toward the sun. further, at one point, there was a perfect triangle formed and on the sw, 10 o'clock position, it appeared something was pulled into the sun, bounced off and appeared as a contrail. after arriving at oxford walmart, while waiting in the car for my husband and a mechanic, i looked up and saw what appeared to be a capsule like object, matte silver with a black band heading on a sw trajectory. i estimated it to be approximately 20,000 ft. agl (above ground level) moving relatively slowly, however, the sky was clear and it appeared to fade completely. no sound, contrail, etc. am beginning to observe strange things over ohio and indiana, lately.
content.summary: Saw orbs going to sun.

content.detailedDescription: Call me.
content.summary: Call me, got four great photos.

content.detailedDescription:
1-i was in the kitchen getting a snack.
2- i heard a low buzzing noise(like a lawn mower but not as choppy and much lower) so i went outside to my back yard to see what it was. it was a noise i have never heard before.
3- i had no clue at all!! at first i was kind of frightened, but then i realized it might be a ufo so i grabbed my camera and a tripod.
4- it looked like a saucer. classic ufo. it slowly moved parallel to me. the time it took me to take the two pictures was about 10-15 seconds if that helps you calculated the speed. it seemed quite far away, but i have no clue how far.
5-i was kind of scared. kind of weirded-out. i felt kind of nauseous.
6- it flew away. i was about to take a third picture, but it was gone before i could take it. it was the fastest i have ever seen anything accelerate in my life.


sorry i left everything anonymous, i just dont feel comfortable with strangers knowing my information.
content.shape: Blimp,   Circle,   Disc,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere
content.summary: I heard a low buzzing sound (like a very deep bass) so i went outside to see what it was. i saw the object and grabbed my camera. i took two pictures before it flew away. i dont think it noticed me.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my lunch break at work. i went to my car in the parking lot and sat in the driver's seat and started to eat. it was hot, so i had the door open. i looked up an saw a blimp shaped object in the sky. i thought it might be a blimp, but it didn't seem to move. i thought, a plane? no. a helicopter? no way. it just sat there in the sky. it was extremely shiny and silver and flashed, almost as if it were spinning on an axis and reflecting the sun. it was solid. i thought it was strange that it didn't move, and was intrigued so i found a spot on my windshield to view it next to, to calculate the area in the sky and it definitely did not move. my lunch was 1/2 hour long and it was there the whole time. i had to return to work inside the building and never saw it again. it was really weird and i told my co-workers and friends!
content.summary: Blimp shaped,  silver object in sky, appeared to be flashing sunlight and stayed in same posiiton for 1/2 hour.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriends parents just recently returned from a trip to mexico.  they visited the mayan ruins of tulum and when they returned we were looking through the photos of the trip.  in one of the photos we noticed something that made us gasp.  you can clearly see a disc shaped craft in the top right corner that was not seen when the photo was taken.  the craft is very clear and the photo is excellent quality.  the photo has not been altered and was taken strait off of the sd card.

the craft appears to be moving very fast and you can even see the shadow below the disc.  this picture will send chills down your back!  with the mayan ruin below, this is one crazy freaking photo.  i have showed this to all of my co-workers, friends and family.  even people who do not believe seem to be taken back by this!!!

please let me know if there is anything further i can do to assist.
content.summary: Disc shapped craft over the mayan ruins of tulum.

content.detailedDescription:
July 2010 denville new jersey




my name is (*name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) and i live in denville nj.  i saw a formation of 7 or 8 lights flying in a nne direction. they were in a "check" formation with more lights on one leg than the other. they passed silently and i only 
observed them for 3 or 4 seconds. the sky was totally cloudless so i 
know they weren't reflected lights. they were solid, steady orangeish 
lights. no pulsing, no flashing. there were no blinking lights of any 
color associated with them. because i couldn't guess the altitude i have 
no reference to there size other than to say they would be about the 
size of a 20 inch object seen at 45-50 feet. there was no trail behind 
them and they moved in a straight line. i was outside on my deck talking 
to a friend who was waiting to catch a flight in california. i was 
sitting back looking up in a northerly direction. they entered my line 
of sight from behind and to the left, flying out of sight over the roof 
in a nne direction. has anyone else reported anything similar at that 
time on that date? i did not make any other report of this incident to 
any official government organization as i was waiting to see if there 
were any news stories in the paper that would confirm what i saw, but 
nothing has been printed. if you wish anymore details, and i'm sure i 
haven't thought of everything you might want to know.
  after checking with my friend, according to her phone log we spoke 
from 2:10 to 2:54 so the time of the sighting  was closer to 2:30 am. 
our property backs up on rt 80 with a tall sound barrier in between. at 
that time of the morning there is very little traffic. as i said 
earlier, the sky was clear so there was no cloud deck to reflect lights. 
furthermore the direction of travel of the objects was perpendicular to 
the highway. i am not a trained observer, have not served in the 
military or law enforcement. i am 48 yrs old and work for (**work info and home address deleted--sgonzalez/cms) nj if you wish to check an on line map. the objects didn't flash by nor did they just drift. at the speed they were moving and as quiet as it was then i would have expected to hear some noise but there was none. they were not fireworks and the precision of the formation leads me to believe they were not space debris or meteors. i hope this info helps.

note: ken pfeifer state director of investigations spoke to the witness today 7-7-10. we are getting more info about this sighting.
content.summary: 7 orange lights in formation flew over.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the roof watching the stars,observed an object that seemed to be
square...Then a triangle with tiny lights flashing,red,brown,black and
sort of a creamy yellow-ish light.I followed the object in my sights for a while...For about 2 minutes 2sec,it then appeared to shoot straight up.
i looked at the time it was 11:51pm on that tuesday evening.A few hours later at about 2:16am i saw another object move slower at a much higher altitude.
content.summary: A slow object that changed shape, with tiny lights flashing.

content.detailedDescription:
Yesterday i captured an invisible ufo picture from my back yard, this object appeared many times since year 2007. 
please add this attached picture to case 18817 file (long term visitation). more details from: [link removed]
content.summary: Black triangle coming again.

content.detailedDescription:
Hoovering amber lights over mountain ridge, several accounts, sometimes fade away or just decend behind mountain.

i grew up on (*possible identifying info deleted--sgonzalez/cms) and lived there, off and on, until 2008. from 2007-08 i have seen on numerous occasions a "floating" orange/amber light just above the mountain ridge as i would make the last turn coming up (**street name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) heading home. i have seen at times two lights, seemingly independent of each other, drift up and down over the ridge line. sometimes as i turned the corner and my vehicle was pointing directly towards the light(s) they would either slowly descend behind the mountain or gradually fade out. other times the light(s) would just sit there and remain until i reached the farmhouse. a couple of times i stood and looked at the lights for several minutes.

we often have fighter jets in the area that practice maneuvers in the daytime, so i always assumed that it was some kind of new military aircraft, but really was puzzled by its characteristics.

i have heard that others in the area have also seen the same lights and couldn't identify them. it happened so frequently that i assumed someone knew what it was and it was really no big deal. i now wonder and just thought i would share it with you, just in case you have other reports from this area.

i'm including a google map link to the area i'm referring to...

http://maps.Google.Com/?Ie=utf8&ll=37.62222,-90.668149&spn=0.014446,0.033023&t=h&z=16

i no longer live in the area, so i have not seen anything there as of late.

i am a professor at a university in st. louis. i do not do any type of drugs and rarely drink alcohol. i was completely sober each time i witnessed these lights. i'm open to the idea of other intelligent life visiting us, but a skeptic by nature. this has left me wondering.

i would be interested to know if you have had any other reports similar to mine in this area.

thanks for your time.
content.summary: Hovering amber lights over mountain ridge, several accounts, sometimes fade away or just decend behind mountain.

content.detailedDescription: This event occured around mid febuary of 1999, sitting on the back of my truck, in my girlfriends driveway, the sun had just set, we were sitting on the tailgate looking at the neighbors treeline directly across the street, this line of trees from were we sat was roughly 150 yards away, that was our horizon, we witnessed what i would describe as a glowing orange ball wobbling slightly back and forth starting to clear the tree line in front of us and moving up. the ball was from my perspective about the diameter of a dime, if you held a dime out in front of your face next to where you see this in the air it was a bit smaller than a dime, it also seemed to be miles behind the treeline in front of us, but that was all we could see was the neighbors woods in front, i knew that he owned a couple acres behind there this could have been miles behind his property. because it looked small but i could clearly see it was orange and round like a ball. i watched it slowly wobble slightly left to right as it rose into the air. this went on for fifteen minutes as it slowly gained altitude all the while wobbling back and fourth, once it reached what appeared from my view point maybe two thousand feet in the air the orange light simply disappeared as if a lite switch was turned off. then about five to ten minutes later something behind and above us cast light onto the ground, very dim but enough to capture my attention, as i turned to look behind maybe a half mile back and around five hundred feet up, moving from right to left, in one motion, was a flaming ball that looked to me like a large, basketball sized roman candle ball shooting behind where we sat. i would guess its rough speed was around 40 miles per hour. it had a slight trail, and was greenish/blue with some white and orange coloring. it went to the left of our view a couple houses over but then went out of view because the land sloped down. i thought this was strange but didn't feel alarmed or frightened by the event, just curious, i thought perhaps someone shot a roman candle but because of its height, speed, burn time, and lack of sound, plus the neighborhood was quiet, i didn't know what to think it was. a month later at the same location, doing the same thing, sitting on the back of the truck, this time a couple hours after the sun had went down, we saw the same sequence of events, the orange ball across the street, followed by the flare/mini meteor object behind us, the only differance this time was that the flare/mini meteor object seemed a bit lower altitude this time, maybe only three hundred feet up, still moving from right to left, but i heard what i would describe as the sound of rock sizzling as it whizzed past us. this is why i call it a mini meteor. the first time this happened in febuary, then a month later. i was in the army stationed at ft.Hood texas at the time. i was off duty and off base when this was witnessed on both occasions, the town of kempner is about twenty miles west of the center of ft.Hood. when we saw the orange ball we were looking towards the south, ft.Hood was to our left, which would have been east, the flare object came east to west. i did read online after this sighting that in 1947 two soldiers stationed at what was then called, camp hood,(ft.Hood)  witnessed what they described as flare like objects in the sky. in both events i felt normal, no missing time or any strange marks.
content.summary: Observed orange glowing sphere wobble above horizon, orange light goes dark, followed by flare type object behind and over head of my location.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving slowly going under i-65s on a local road with my wife. it was about 10:20pm, since that was the time i saw shortly after the event.
as we came out from under i-65 i noticed a yellowish flaming ball in the sky on the driver's side in front of us. it was motionless like a star. fireworks were going off ocassionally. but what made this event stand out was the large size about the size of a bluberry. the duration was about 1 minute, and it was covered with flames moving in an upward direction, like if you hold a piece of paper and burn it the flame flows up to the sky.
it at first was steady but its size being too large for any fireworks and the fact it was burnig as if on fire but orb with flames not as an explosion or flare. it pulsed aftered i showed my wife and got dimmer then noticablely brighter, then dimmer, and gone. it was amazing!
content.summary: Spotted yellow flame like orb about size of a blueberry near i-65s from 38th st.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching fireworks with my family when i noticed an orange light. at first i thought it was an airplane but noticed it was one solid light as it came overhead. there was no noise. several family members were watching it as well. we noticed that it moved at a quick and steady pace, heading south. when it was directly over us, the light went out but we could still see it moving south and it looked metalic. as it got further from us, we couldn't see it anymore. my family's first thoughts were that it was possibly the supplies for the space station falling to earth but the way it was traveling looked unusual.
content.summary: Rectangular orange light, gliding across the sky making no noise.

content.detailedDescription: We were celebrating the 4th when we noticed these objects at different times, some were singles other multiples. our digital cameras couldnt take good photos due to it being dark and a long shutter speed. these objects moved in different directions and flickered in and out. these were not fireworks or airplanes/helicopter as i know the differences.
content.summary: Multiple red-orange spheres.

content.detailedDescription:
We were outside for fireworks in our neighborhood on july 4 2010 in louisville ky. i didnt have the camera at first and did not capture the first one i seen. i went and got camera and another one appeared again. i appeared to be round and orange in color and glowing. it made no sound and moved from the south towards the north. it eventually disappeared either out of my line of sight behind trees and such or just disappeared. i could not really tell. when zoomed in on my camera it appeared to have pits and crators like the moon. on one side it looked like there was a hole or mouth so to speak. it appeared with the naked eye to look as if it had a ring around it or was glowing. in the video i took it does not look that way.

had no clue what it was other than an object i had never seen before. i thought at first maybe it was the embers from a firework left over but it never disappeared like those do. then i realized this is something more. the color was close to how the end of a lit cigarette would look in the dark.It was moving steady in one direction. no jumping around. the video i took which will be attached looks as if its moving but its more of trying to stablize the camera after zooming than anything. it did travel in more of a straight line moving south to the north but it did not jump up and down or anything.
content.summary: Orange glowing round basketball looking type object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was 14 years old, my mother was driving.  it was winter and dark at the time.  we were driving route 287 north towards boonton. near bridge on 287 north near boonton resevoir(jersey city resevoir officialy known as).
people were stopped on highway looking at gold disc shaped object at tree top level, it was very detailed, silent, rotating lights, the thing that really struck me was the port holes were clearly visable.  other witness's were present maybe 15 people, it was also in the daily record at the time. the craft was visable about 15 minutes, after which it silently zoomed off a great speed.  my mother said to me it was some type of russian plane, i said i doubt that!  i did not feel scared just amazed!
what was weird, after that incident, i had a dream at home that a face was staring at me in my bed, oval head large black eyes, it seemed very real i was scared to death! never had that again, today the face i saw is known as an grey alien.  also after that my mother and i were chased by a man in a gold dodge scamp around boonton he had dark glasses and looked sraight ahead i told my mother to drive to boonton police station then he left chasing us.
content.summary: Gold disc at tree top level, silent, port holes visible, rotating lights around it.

content.detailedDescription:
Lying underneath cedar trees with my dog, prior to sunset, i noticed a bright light from the ne which i initially thought was an airplane but as it got closer i could hear a rumbling sound but not like a jetliner. it reminded me of the sound of a shuttle re-entry which i witnessed in the mid 90's. it was also much brighter as it got closer. i was excited and curious but couldn't clearly discern the image as it was bright/silver white and moving very fast. 
i continued to watch it travel se until the point of light disappeared. the light remained steady...It did not dim, blink or flash until it disappeared.
this was no airplane as it was two to three times larger and it seemed to have some sort of tail or fin.
content.summary: As bright object from ne got closer, roaring sound was prevalent as a ship on re-entry.

content.detailedDescription: "yo man. its mike. rick's friend. you remember me. well, im writing you right now, cause im freakin out cause i just experienced the most unexplainable thing thats ever happened to me, and with our background knowledge and our better understanding to whats actually out there, i figured you'd be the only one who would hear me out and not think im nuts instead. ok... so i was driving back from going to blockbuster wanting to rent tapes, and it was closed, and i forgot to get cigs, so i have to go back out to get them, but besides that point, the trip was basically useless. so im about to pull in my driveway, and i notice weird lights in the sky. at first, i thought it was an airplane, cause it had blinking lights of blue and red, but dismissed that idea when i noticed how impossible the movements it was making. and as i was looking at it, though, watching it almost flying around, stopping for a minute and moving again to the next spot, i dunno if it was a trick of my eyes, or what, but i could've sworn i saw a very thin beam going down to the ground for a few seconds. at the moments when it was stopped. now, i know right now, i sound insane, but i swear man, i've never seen a ufo before, but this genuinely is true!!! i would never ever lie about something like this, if you ask anybody who knows me, they can tell you im the most honest person they know. anyways, so i started freaking out, and parked at the end of my driveway, in the middle of the street, just amazed at what i was witnessing. and wondering if it could see me. and i actually was speaking out loud to it, as if i was talking to it as if it were a person, "can you see me?" and when i said that, it slowed down and stopped for a minute, and then it went white and moved back as it blinked out. and i was like, "holy ****, omg!!!" and i stayed for a minute and noticed it above the trees which i was at first looking at it between. it seemed to be traveling across the sky, closer to where i was. this is when i really started to get the adrenaline pumping cause it was almost as if it was responding to me. so i slowly pulled in my driveway while watching it coming closer in the sky, and i parked and got out. now, here was my chance to see if i could hear anything, that way, as impossible it may have seemed at the time, i was thinking, maybe it was a helicopter. so, i was standing outside watching it get closer, and then finally passing me by slowly overhead, and continuing. no sound whatsoever as it glided smoothly in the sky, still with that light pattern (which was very unique also) of blue and red. the scarier thing?? as i watched it passby overhead, i saw another one doing the same from the opposite direction, over from behind me!! i looked in the sky closer and noticed a few of them!!! one or two doing that weird beam thing i said before!!! i was having a panic attack by then, ran inside. my mind was racing!!! and of course, i know it of course could be extraterrestrial, but my mind clicked with a scarier thought... that it could be some kind of top secret ****** up government ****!!!! anyways, i went on my back porch for a minute trying to find them again, but i didnt see them. im about to go out to the driveway again, cause thats more open sky, and see if i can find one again. (cont'd., but no other information provided)..."
content.distance: 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My first ufo experience, late @ night & alone at the end of my driveway; a truly life-altering experience...

content.detailedDescription: A couple of days ago i reported and sent a video in on my july 3rd sighting titled: "really bright orange/ red orb" on july 4th i had a friend over. i had told her about what i had saw the night before and showed her the video. we both were sitting outside and she is the one that actually pointed this out and said "is that one of those things?" i had my canon digital camera again and took a video of it. i apologize it automatically loads up in quicktime and takes a really long time to load up but i do not know how to change it myself. i wasn't going to share this one because i didn't want it to take away from my other report on the july 3rd event. this time it was a little further away and moving alot faster. this one didn't hover it just flew in a path. i wasn't sure it was the same thing but it does look like it.
content.summary: Orange red orb.

content.detailedDescription: Was coming over watertower over hwy and over the strip was not very high, moved slow then fast and dissapeared. we were driving very slow i was hanging out the window we turned on nearest sidestreet and stopped and watched, as aircraft commonly fly over area i can say it was definatly no aircraft or firework.
content.summary: Round dull orange (flame).

content.detailedDescription:
Name: [cms/tg/pid], age: 17, first afo(alien flying object) encounter.
i was a good hour away from home, i was walking down the dean bridge.
dean in general is covered by forrest, so as i was walking the bridge there was forrest on both sides of me. the tree lines of the forrest left middle viewing of the night sky. so i could see the moon and some stars, very pretty. but the trees wouldn't allow me to see the left or right side of the night sky. the bridge slants to the right side, so it was kinda hard to walk on it, espicially all the cars zooming by so fast.
as im walking i look down on the floor and notice all the trash on the bridge. thats when i hear a strange sound panning into my right ear. the sound gets louder and louder. a description of the sound is hard to describe, but here it goes....Deffinately loud and i started to notice a rythem to the sound, it sounded very swooshy going back and fourth, before the craft came into sight i could tell that the sound it made was that of a very large scanning/radar device scanning planet earth, earth as in the dean forrest where i happen to be walking by. so while im still walking and hear it i look up to see what it is. then the giant hover craft slowly hovers into view, at first i saw the middle diamond triangle point. instantly i knew this was not a plane of any sort, it wasnt shaped like a plane, deffinately did not sound like any plane engine and no air plane flys so close to trees, electrical poles and even nearby stores and houses. the alien hover craft now takes up more than half the night sky. im walking forward while looking straight up at the sky, it got to the point were i could not see no such thing as night sky, only the massive size of this hover craft. so everything around became much more darker with no moon light. sense the hover craft afirst appeared it had some what random flashing lights in differant order and differant color.
the random colors inclueded red, white, green and yellow lights. the lights were located in differant spots, it felt like the lights would chose were to flash, so they never really flashed in the same spot, either changing possition or change of color in the selected possition.
the loud scanning/radar sound could still be heard. as it covered the night sky i felt a somewhat change in temperture, the heat around me elevated, like a mass amount of radiation being emitted from either the lights, or the hover craft technology being used. around this time i got another feeling as if time was slowling down for me making the sighting more meaningfull. this is around the time that one of the drivers see me, some random guy looking straight up at the sky, not even looking at the road. my guess is that the drivers didnt see the craft at all, cause it was too much above them. most had there windows up, if they had them down then im sure they coulda heard the futuristic radar device emitting from the hover craft. so when one of the cars honk a few times to get my attention, i wake up from the slown down trance that occured when the large craft body blocked the night sky view. i look back up at the sky and the diamond shaped hover craft is still there slowly hovering, making the same sounds and the same random order of flashing lights. at this moment i am beyond amazed like this was a life changing moment that i had been waiting for, reason being, my father is also a ufo fanatic and believes cause he too has had a couple ufo sightings, strange thing is that he too saw and encountered his first alien space craft when he was 17 in puerto rico. back too the diamond shaped craft. it was a mixture of both a diamond and a triangle, instead of a diamond back end being a mirror image of the front side, the back side was closed of and reconnected like that of a triangle. for the split seconds that the lights would shut off, thats when the craft hovered over the moonlight, so that would let me see the shadow, shape and color of the craft. the hover craft was deffinately dark grey to black in color, looked very sleek in design, it like that of a very futuristic science fiction movie, i too felt like for the first time in my life i was experiencing a sci-fi movie. even more amazed than before the hover craft slowly started to move past the dean trees so i could now see the back section of the craft with two points sticking out and reconnecting at the back. now the night sky and moonlight slowly came back into view. the craft kept on passing in its direction going over the tree line, and this whole time the craft was feets away from the tallest trees, which meant the craft was too close, this is deffinately a very close range encounter, and at such close range gave me the opportunity to really examine the craft and get full details on it. by this time i reached the road again so no more bridge. now only 25 percent of the craft could be seen, but the loud noise it made dimmed down as it got further from me. i can still hear te hovering, then it hovers pass the tree line, becoming out of sight, but for the next 30-50 seconds i could still hear the rythmic scanning device and the sound of hovering. it is now gone completely but still hovering in the area, i wish i coulda tooken a picture but i was too amazed, so the picture that will be posted on this, is a photo from another ufo sight of triangular crafts to give an example of its appearence. 
from what i know there was no missing gaps of time, like the betty and barnie hill case, so i wasnt abuducted, but i know that it deffinately noticed me. and its odd cause that was the night that i basicly ran away from my house and didnt come home for hours, and came home around 2 in the morning. my walk back was mesmorising. this was pretty much my perfect description of my first ufo/afo encounter. till this day, when ever im outside, i keep a constant look at the sky, day or night time, im searching and waiting for the ufo to hover by, theyve all been planes sense but i can tell the differance. its funny cause the next morning i tottaly forgot that i saw the hover craft, later in the day i remembered again and started to tell family and friends, ive told the story a good amount of times now. well thats it, i guess email me on what you think, or any questions.
content.summary: Huge diamond shaped hover craft covering the night sky completely. very close encounter due to craft hovering right above the tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
talking on the phone and driving towards a 4way stop, nearby a mom & pop store on the corner.
 i looked up to see venus, brightly lit, with a few stars faint in the distance. when i looked back at the intersection, i saw what appeared to be the constellation of the big dipper, at first...But, the stars were larger and glowed with a slight orange-red tint to them.
 bewildered, i almost lost my breathe trying to get a better look and pulling over into the store parking lot. totally, losing my conversation on the phone..I attempted to tell them my situation and what it was i was seeing. my excitement was evident in my reaction and the told me to take a picture, so i hung up and attempted to use my cell to capture what my mind was struggling to identify.
 the mere size of the object was enormous, the size of a small walmart. moving from a sw to ne direction, slowly and purposely around the light pollution of nearing neighborhoods. this object first appeared as moving lights, which seemed to come into a form, and appear as a larger massive diamond/triangular shape with smooth round edges.
 as i sat in the car with the engine turned off and the window down, i attempted to hear some type of noise...There was nothing. i was just feeling great anxiety and astonishment at my seeing this object and not believing it was actually floating over an entire neighborhood.
 as it moved behind a tree line following the tracks, i had to follow in my car. still amazed, i was questioning what it was i just witnessed for the past 3 minutes. while trying to catch my breathe and sense of humor, i looked up  searching again for the lights, but just as they had appeared they had vanished. leaving me with knowing i had grown up near a air base and international airports and never had i seen in real life or on tv or the internet anything remotely close to what i had just seen.
content.summary: Massive triangular shape creeps by as it follows train track.

content.detailedDescription: On monday the 5th of july i stepped outside to take some pictures of the sun setting on my cell phone (blackberry)as i always do. i took several pictures but didnt have the change to review them til the next day.The next day i went through each one and noticed that the clouds had form a face of a person pointing up so i looked up and there was a ufo. i reviewed the previous picture before that one and noticed four ufos. they look like their are in some kind of formation. three of the four are aline like the pyramids or like alintak,alrilam and mintaka the three stars of orion constellation> the face of the clouds looks mad but and is still piontting up towards the ufos. the sun is behind some clouds  and it looks like another face . people that ive should the pictures and pionted out the images have freaked out. i dont want to send them this way however you can contact by cell [number deleted/cms/tg]
content.summary: Pictures of the sun sunsetting.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife and kids were going out.I walked out side and looked up.I seen two objects flying side by side.May be from were i was looking in the sky.It could of been a few miles apart.What made me keep looking was the speed that they were traveling.What caught my attention was that.They changed directions in a blink of an eye,and was gone.I never told anyone,but my wife and kids.I tell the same story all the time as it happened yesterday.I always look in the sky day in night.It was at that split second.I looked up as we were going to the car.It looked light to bright lights circled shaped and bright as a star.They were apart side by side one was a little behind.Then it made a u turn and was gone.I never seen anything like it.I never in a million years would of thought.That ufos existed,until then.
content.summary: Two bright white light made a u turn in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 1 pm on a very hot saturday afternoon in my backyard in parkville md. on july 3rd 2010. i was watching my boys play in their swimming pool. i happened to look up at the sky. their were very few clouds. i noticed a very fast flying sphere extremely high in the sky. i first thought it was an airplane, but it was totally round in shape. i didn't notice any wings. that's when i got excited. i didn't hear any noise. it was moving se to nw in a straight line. i see planes all of the time, from passenger planes to military planes high in the atmosphere. the object i saw left no exhaust trails and moved faster then any flying object i have ever seen. it was only in view for less 30 seconds. if i didn't look up when i did, i would have missed it.
content.summary: Very fast flying sphere. extremely high in the sky. no noise. moving se to nw.

content.detailedDescription:
At around 21:35 us central time i left my home for an evening walk around the neighborhood.  i stopped briefly to speak with a neighbor who passed in his car, and then resumed my walk.  the street i was on runs north-west to south-east for a short distance and then curves to a north to south orientation.  as i rounded the curve headed due south, i received a text message from my son who was at work.  the text message arrived at 21:46.  i read the message and slipped my phone back in my pocket.  as i did so, i looked up into the southern night sky and immediately noticed two points of light which i initially thought were stars.  they were not blinking or flashing, were white in color, and were stationary, at about 35 degrees above the horizon.  the lights were side by side, and parallel to the horizon.  within a few seconds of seeing them, the points of light began a slow rotation to an orientation vertical to the horizon, with one above the other.  the rotation took about 3-5 seconds.  after moving to the vertical orientation they stopped and remained motionless for about 5 seconds.  by this time i had stopped walking and was standing stationary, in awe of what i was witnessing.  after remaining motionless in the vertical orientation for about 5 seconds, the two lights began moving in opposite directions, the bottom towards the east and the top towards the west, and an incredible rate of speed.  it only took 2-3 seconds for the lights disappear behind the trees on the eastern and western horizons.   

i was startled and a little frightened by what i witnessed.  i am an avid night sky watcher and i am familiar with what airplanes and helicopters look like in the night sky.  the lights i saw were neither, nor were they meteors or satellites. the objects were obviously very far away, and to move the distances they moved in just a few seconds means they were moving incredibly fast.
content.summary: Two star like objects parallel to the horizon rotated to an orientation vertical to the horizon then separated at a high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: I had decided to take my vacation on the 4 of july and this year go camping at tolland state forest in mass. it was a tuesday night around 11:30pm the heat was scorching all day long and the night wasnt any better .It must have been 85 degrees at 11pm . just before i call it a day i usually grab my binnoculars and look at the stars. my binnoculars are made for looking at the stars they are 80*100 power . being in the woods camping is great for star watching because it pitch black .Anyways i started watching what i thought was a satelight moveing slowly across the sky and out of boardem i started to watch .Within 3 seconds there was a bright flash of wight light ,the brightest light i ever seen come from what i thought was a satelight. it wasnt just the light that amazed me it was the speed and distance all at once. the only way to discribe it is as if you are watching a shooting star except the star doesnt stop it just keeps going across the sky,and then take a left turn going that fast. it was amazing to watch. there was a time when i use to look for these things ,and it was nice this one came to me .
content.summary: Speed and distance was amazing.

content.detailedDescription:
In my driveway watching fireworks display to the west of our home, put on by our village.  my wife notice the lights described below which appears behind us.

at a distance of approximately 4-5 miles and approximately 2500-3000 ft. above the ground, my wife and i observed 10 rusty orange lights in sky west of my home travelling nnw.  there was one lead light and several hundred yards behind it there was a second light. a thrid and fourth light were several hundred yards behind the second light there were two lights at the same elevation but were offset to the left and right of the line of travel.  (if you were to draw a line between the 2nd light and the two lights behind it would form a triangle.)  additionally there were 6 other lights behind the two off-set lights (3rd and 4th light), again travelling at the same speed and elevation and in a straight line as measured from the lead light.  the last 5 or so lights were spaced closer together than the lead for lights.  please note the spacing between the first and second and the second and third/fourth lights were approximately the same distance.

the light continue travelling to the nnw and all "blinked out" at the exact same spot in the sky.  please note that the "blinking out" was not due to them reaching a point where you couldn't see them any more.  they were readily seen and at a point in the sky, just blinked out and could been easily seen just prior.

as a result of this sighting my "feelings" were unchanged.  i am believer in ufos and carefully observed the lights.

the curious thing about this observation was how each light maintained the exact same speed, elevation and how the lead lights were spaced what appeared to be the exact same distance from each other and how they all "blinked out" at the same spot in the sky.
content.summary: Series of orange lights at same elevation travelling nnw.

content.detailedDescription:
About 5:15-5:33 am
on january 7th

i stepped outside this morning and looked up into the sky towards the west and observed a bright star...It was a beautiful night, and i can see the milky way very clearly it was nice! my attention then turned to this star and something dim appeared underneath it. i thought to my self, my eyes are adjusting and im seeing all the dim stars now! well this dim star, started to get brighter like an incoming plane and as i acknowlege the oddity of the fiery orange color it started to move north.

the light would dim in and out...It went from bright orange to completely disappearing...I thought to myself...Perhaps a strange a funky plane? however the dimming and the brightening was very random, even the intensity was random. it was going from south to north...But my impression of it was that it was very very high in the atmosphere covering a lot of ground much because it had the speed and movement very much like a satellite, so i thought oookay it's must be a satellite. finally when it dimmed out yet again...It did not reappear where i assumed it would...(the line...Rather than keeping in a straight line...Reappeared in a totally different part of the sky (moved my direction east)...Then back to where is was before...(then moved farther west) and got brighter and moved towards my east again...At this point. i got scared and went back in...I wanted to wake up my brother to see all the activity in the sky.  

(around 5:20ish) i went back out and it either was out of my viewing range or that it disappeared.

more details: a minute later we saw the typical satellites making their usual orbits(white color, did not flicker and moved in a linear line)...And at the same time a pair of satellites made their way across the sky as well. i am putting this detail in because they made for a good observation to how different this fireball was to a typical satellite. i added these details so that maybe this can give a better time frame and location in the sky. also if your were to look at this star where i first noticed the fireball underneath it and scan your eyes towards the south you would see orions belt.
content.summary: Flickering fireball.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a copy of the siting as reported to another site:


i witnessed something today along with my dad. we saw a large redish orange light in an arc shaped trajectory over southeast michigan. i'm in woodhaven and i could see it starting from the northeast and it was heading to the west of where i was. it was heading in an arc and couldn't see it after it disappeared behind the houses. it must have been very low to go behind the houses with it seeming to be so close, unless it was very large and far away. it was either glowing or burning a red-orange color.It was not a steady light and it was not blinking like a plane either, more of a flicker or pulse like a fire. my dad kept saying how it looked like a hot air balloon that was on fire to him. also it was moving way to fast to be a blimp. we could not figure out what it was. i'm not sure the exact time but it was around dusk. the sun was down but it wasn't completely night either. i just found this email on the website when i was looking for news reports. i figured it was a meteor or something and others must have seen it. i live near an airport (grosse ile) and a hospital that very often has helicopters and i can honestly say i've never seen anything look like this before. also the helicopters are very loud and this was not making any sound from what i could tell. i wanted to get some film of it but at the rate it was going i knew i wouldn't be back in time with the camera before it went behind the houses out of my view also i was like a deer in the headlights watching it anyway. 



living near an airport and hospital i see things in the sky all the time. i've never seen anything lit like this. the color, and intensity was all wrong compared to any plane i've seen.
content.summary: Red-ish orange large fire ball moving east to west.
